text: Norman Hall may refer to: * Norman Hall (politician) (1829–1917), member of the U.S. House of Representatives from Pennsylvania * Norman Hall (Gainesville, Florida), a historic academic building on the eastern campus of the University of Florida * Norman B. Hall (1886–1962), first aviation engineering officer in the United States Coast Guard * Norman J. Hall (1837–1867), officer in the United States Army during the American Civil War * Norman S. Hall (1895–1964), American screenwriter ==See also== * Normans Hall, a Tudor house in Prestbury, Cheshire, England Hall, Norman
title: Norman Hall
